name: BaltCap
overview:
BaltCap is the leading private equity investor in the Baltic States (Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania). We provide equity capital for growth-oriented Baltic companies. Since 1995, we have invested into 38 different companies and completed 24 exits.

In addition to financing, BaltCap always seeks to add value to the portfolio companies. Our team has a hands-on approach and works closely together with the company management out of our offices in the Baltic capitals. We believe that our experience and network of advisers contribute a lot to our portfolio companiesâ€™ success.

Over 12 years BaltCap has raised five funds: Baltic Investment Fund I and II are fully exited; Baltic Investment Fund III and Baltic SME Fund are fully invested; BaltCap Private Equity Fund is actively investing.

BaltCap is a member of European Private Equity & Venture Capital Association (EVCA) and Estonian, Latvian and Lithuanian Venture Capital Associations.

milestones.description: BaltCap Closes $42M Fund For Latvian Companies
milestones.source_text: BaltCap, a private equity and venture capital firm focusing on mid-market expansion capital and buyout investments in the Baltic States, has signed an agreement with European Investment Fund to establish a EUR30 million ($42.4 million) venture capital fund
